org.sensorhub.impl.service.sos

Class SensorDataProviderConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.impl.service.sos.SOSProviderConfig
      • org.sensorhub.impl.service.sos.StreamDataProviderConfig
        • org.sensorhub.impl.service.sos.SensorDataProviderConfig

  • public class SensorDataProviderConfig
extends StreamDataProviderConfig

    Configuration class for SOS data providers using the sensor API. A storage can also be associated to the sensor so that archive request for this sensor data can be handled through the same offering.

    Since:
    Sep 7, 2013
    Author:
    Alex Robin
